text: John Edward "Jack" Reagan (July 13, 1883 â€“ May 18, 1941) was the father of United States President Ronald Reagan and his older brother Neil "Moon" Reagan.Kengor, Paul (2004), p. 4 He was married to Nelle Wilson Reagan from 1904 until his death in 1941. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1883 births Category:1941 deaths Category:Reagan family Category:People from Illinois
